author: nikmagini
body:
Dear HTTP group,

this is a request for the release of PhEDEx agents 4.1.5.
Main changes in the release:
- properly handle agent disconnections from the DB
- drop dependency on obsolete DBS2 scripts/client
- add templates for gfal verify/delete scripts
- Fix for https://github.com/dmwm/PHEDEX/issues/946

Tested by Meric in PhEDEx Dev instance.

Note that PhEDEx agents are not deployed on cmsweb, so the release should be done outside the normal cmsweb release cycle

Thanks
Nicolo
title: PhEDEx agent 4.1.5 release and website 4.2.14 release
